title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, March 2, 2010 - Randolph Packing Co. Inc., an Asheboro, N.C. establishment, is recalling approximately 96,000 pounds of beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products subject...
impacted_products: Combo bin packages of "Randolph Packing Co., Inc. BONELESS BEEF."
Combo bin packages of "Randolph Packing Co. Knuckles 90% & 94%."
